description: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models:A single or set of synchronous machines for converting mechanical power into alternating-current power. For example, individual machines within a set may be defined for scheduling purposes while a single control signal is derived for the set. In this case there would be a GeneratingUnit for each member of the set and an additional GeneratingUnit corresponding to the set.

contents.name: initialMW
contents.description: Default initial active power  which is used to store a powerflow result for the initial active power for this unit in this network configuration. Default: 0.0

contents.name: maxOperatingMW
contents.description: This is the maximum operating active power limit the dispatcher can enter for this unit. Default: 0.0

contents.name: startupCost
contents.description: The initial startup cost incurred for each start of the GeneratingUnit. Default: 0.0

contents.name: totalEfficiency
contents.description: The efficiency of the unit in converting the fuel into electrical energy. Default: 0.0

contents.name: MemberOf_EquipmentContainerVL
contents.description: A generating unit can be associated to an equipment container via the same voltage level.
